name: Forecast Revenue
query:
SELECT
    lead as "Lead:Data:250",
    stage as "Stage:Data:150",
    SUM(amount) * 12 as "Annual Revenue(Amount * 12):Currency:300"
FROM
    `tabLeed`
WHERE
    stage in ("Contracting", "Proposal")
    AND status not in ("Churned", "Standby")
GROUP BY
    lead;
